
```{r}
library(iSTOP)
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)

CDS_coordinates <- CDS_Scerevisiae_UCSC_sacCer3()

scer <- BSgenome.Scerevisiae.UCSC.sacCer3::Scerevisiae

results_BSgenome <- 
  CDS_coordinates %>%
  filter(chr %in% c('chrII', 'chrIII')) %>%
  locate_codons(scer) %>%
  locate_iSTOP(scer)

chrII_and_III <- 
  Biostrings::readDNAStringSet(
    c('http://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/sacCer3/chromosomes/chrII.fa.gz',
      'http://hgdownload.soe.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/sacCer3/chromosomes/chrIII.fa.gz'))

results_DNAStringSet <- 
  CDS_coordinates %>%
  filter(chr %in% c('chrII', 'chrIII')) %>%
  locate_codons(chrII) %>%
  locate_iSTOP(chrII)
```
